did.unittitle: Herman A. Starobin Unpublished Manuscript on International Trade Regulation Policy in the United States
did.abstract: "International Trade Regulation Policy in the U.S." by Herman Starobin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of Herman Starobin's unpublished manuscript, "International Trade Regulation Policy in the U.S." The manuscript conststs of first draft of Chapters 1 and 2, probably written in 1997.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Herman A. Starobin Unpublished Manuscript on International Trade Regulation Policy in the United States #6100m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: "Herman Starobin, a former research director of the International Ladies Garment Workers Union and a critic of free-trade policies, died on Saturday at Lenox Hill Hospital in Manhattan." -- nytimes.com - 2021.06.02
